Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: I tiny bar where Rembrandt may have possibly sold his paintings for 3 guilders! (But don‚Äôt quote me!)

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Perfect spot, we stumbled upon this very famous place by accident and so glad we did. The service was great and the atmosphere was very relaxed, a perfect dog-friendly spot to rest in the sweltering heat in Amsterdam.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very old and charming building. It‚Äôs crowded for a reason. Wonderful location to sit, have a pint, or three, and nibble on Bitterballen. Bitterballen are round tasty little bites of fried meaty yumminess served with mustard. We sat on the ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Small, often very busy, but when the sun is out quite nice to sit down and have a bite to eat. I return every time for their tosti's, which are always good to eat. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Good vibes, great location and very kind waiter, all for a reasonable price.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text:
Cute cafe by the canal, ideal to spend a rainy afternoon.
The service is very friendly.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A beautiful and historical pub precariously perched on the canal. Great outdoor seating and mix of people. It is a must to stop in for a few drinks or a cup of coffee. The bartenders are great, they are fast and very personable even when ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very polite and friendly service. Many locals. Great small snacks.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: The bar has an amazing view of the canals and the staff was really friendly. I recommend to try the Dutch meat balls, they were really tasty.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Love the atmosphere üòçüòçüòç what's such a great experience, sat nearby the river, drank a good beer in the cafe 300 year-old

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Such a cosy place with great views and affordable drinks (wines for 4 euros, Gin Tonics around 9 euros). There are blankets for when it's cold outside but still want to enjoy the great views. Inside however is really small and smelly (old beer aromas), with a sticky floor. Toilets are clean.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Good place to grab drinks and snacks while sitting outside enjoying the view. Friendly staff. Free wifi.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: The cappuccino tasted great.The stuff was very polite and friendly. Would definitely recommend and visit again.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: The worst bar I went in Amsterdam. We went there in 10 people group but no one was satisfied with their service. The glasses were not clean and when we objected for this they just laughed! I think the only interesting thing here was their ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Lovely place to visit, good atmosphere, somewhere in the center! Nice personal and original beers! Recommended!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Waited 10 minutes to get a menu, another 15 to order 3 beers and finally just walked off after another 20 elapsed. The restaurant was at less than half capacity. Lame.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great old 17th century cafe across from Rembrandt museum. Have a Kwak beer there and rest watching canal activities.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Super cool and cozy place. They even have phone chargers with proper lockers. Beers are great and the location itself is unique. Also the service is fast and super efficient.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great view, great service

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very friendly staff, cozy place and tasty coffee!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very cute cafe house with good beer options, although not much wine. Beautiful views of the canal in a charming old house with very slanted floors which actually added to the charm. The food menu could be a little better. I do not recommend the fried cheese at all but the croquettes weren‚Äôt bad.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: This place has tremendous vibes. The bar itslef is tiny, and there is little indoor seating. But the outdoor patio overlooking the canals is perfect, especially for a nice day. There are a few (not a ton) communal tables on the patio. It gets packed and loud later in the day, so try to come on a weekday before 4pm if you want a spot.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Lovely quaint pub in a lovely part of Amsterdam

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Nice place to have a few drinks and something to eat with a nice view.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Looks great. Unfortunately closed due to COVID restrictions, like all other places

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text:
Really great flat white in a really old building.
Atmosphere very unique, good tunes.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Super cute spot. Nice view on the canal. Expect typical Dutch borrel snacks and some good beers,  even tastier under the sun, that you can enjoy in their outdoor space.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Nice! No more words needed.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great spot, friendly service and delicious snacks.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great view, and nice bar food.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Incredible place next to the canals with a nice view to have a bier or coffee.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very nice place by the canal. Great food

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A great place to drink beer and look at boats that sail the river

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: My new local beer spot!  cozy and a nice range of beers on tap!  building is an old bridge watch and built in traditional Amsterdam style which means it leans a bit.  Also seems to have a beautiful terrace for the summer and a view to the ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A great place for a drink and cheese and bitterballen. The building itself from the outside is somewhat subsided. Don't let this fool you as the inside matches and can make you feel like your beer is stronger than it is! The staff here were great and the atmosphere is very chilled and comfortable.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: My favorite cafe in Amsterdam. We stumbled across this place on our way back from the town center and sat upstairs. We had an awesome view of the canal and enjoyed watching boats go by. This place also has a great terrace, but it was a little too cold for us Californians to sit outside when we visited.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Gorgeous, petite building, 100% recommend to grab a table outside the view on the canal is gorgeous. The food and drink is very reasonable unlike other areas in the city. Only thing that I didnt like was the restrooms,  dangerous stairs narrow and slippy.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very nice beers in here and friendly staff. Very bright considering it's quite small. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: It's nice that they have outdoor tables with heating. I wouldn't like to stay inside during Covid times. You can stay there during cold September nights as well.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Historic, charming little building. The menu and decoration is not very original and it's often pretty crowded. But the terrace is actually quite tranquil for how central this establishment is located.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Thought this would be a nice place to grab a drink and early dinner. Instead of the "cozy" atmosphere claimed by so many reviewers, I found a bar full of bartenders who were loud, inconsiderate and downright obnoxious. Not what I would have ‚Ä¶

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Good place for drinks near the water. They serve hardly anything fresh, so alcohol or standard tea/coffee is what you can expect. It was very windy the time I was there, but thankfully the waiters had attached menus to the table so they didn't fall into the canal.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Awesome watering hole with outstanding Dutch finger food (also try the delicious french fries).  If you sit outside in the back, you'll enjoy the scenic views down the canal to the NEMO.  Just a relaxing place to drink beer and watch the canal boats go by.  All this comes with a very affordable food and drink menu.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Best vibes and view!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text:
Amazing old pub in Amsterdam, the building is slightly crooked for the years.
We payed 8 euro for each beer, I think it's bit pricey even though the Place Is cool.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Different beers, good fingerfood, nice location

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A nice small place to drink by the sluys tower that has a history behind it.. we can still see the gates through which boats used to sail and taxes were collected. First floor has a better view of all four directions.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Go to this pub. The building is on a canal, and is falling over...or has, at least, tipped over quite a bit over the hundreds of years it has been in existence. The beer is fine, the prices are average, the staff are really nice, but this place gets aces all around for atmosphere. It's just comfortable.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: One of the best views in Amsterdam for enjoying ur drink or eating. It is a great place to make a party. Enough space&service was so good&fast. Love the boats passing by all the time. Totally recommended!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Got here after visiting one of the nearby coffee shops. It has a great vibe inside, and the slightly slanted interior makes it very interesting - if you don't look outside the windows, you will feel that something is not exactly right :) It is a great place to drop by either after visiting the Rembrandt museum, or a nearby coffee shop!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great place for draft beer, nice atmosphere. With a visit

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text:
Have a beer. Enjoy the view.
Away from the crowds.
Have some bites.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Superb beer and surprisingly excellent nibbley food; best curly fries I've had in a long time. Also if you're sat outside by the water you get to be in loads of photos being taken by the boat tours going by.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text:
Nice bar close to the canal, with beautiful views during day and night. They have some finger food options too, typical Dutch pub food.
The place is quite picturesque, due to the tilt of the building.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Effing adorable and a must. Good wings toooo. Will return everytime. My place.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: It's the location that distinguish this place from many similar places around.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A crocked bar in a very nice location in Amsterdam. The beer is fair priced and they have a good selection. The service is ok. The view is pretty nice :). It is a good place for a chilled late afternoon drinking beer.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Bar is next to a small dam in the canels, Really cool location. Has nice outdoor seating. Only downside is that it is often full with Dutch student associations.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: It was very promising from the outside, we noticed it while on a canal ride. Went there with probably high expectations of coziness and niceness. It was a pretty average bar with average service, though it did have nice interior.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: This might be my favorite place in Amsterdam to sit outside and have a drink.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Excellent location and view,  friendly environment,  positive vibe, friendly staff, not overcharged prices. A perfect spot to have a drink before or after the Rembrandt museum!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Lovely pub with 2 canal side patios.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: This little bar is perfect. Warm and cozy.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great place to have a beer overlooking the canals of Amsterdam.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Awesome location, tasty snacks and cold beers :)

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Really cool canal side caf√®, sloping floors and all. Wasn't too busy when we visited so had upstairs to ourselves for a while. Friendly and helpful staff.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very nice cafe, very warm and welcoming service. Loved the beer, the cosy interior and the heaters outside. The cat was super, too!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A classy place, with a excellent view

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Nice place to have a beer or drink after walking around Amsterdam. You have a view of boats passing by. Took a beer and cheeses,al fresco with a friend.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: From a world traveler, sitting on the patio at the caf√© s is one of my favorite places on planet earth to relax and collect my thoughts.  Truly beautiful place to take in the beauty of Amsterdam.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Decent beer selection and lovely seating along a canal. Food options were tasty, but limited

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: It's more than 20 minutes since we entered, they already cleaned our table but we are still waiting for someone to ask what we want or even say HELLO. Worst service ever and it's not the first time. Because of the beatiful location and place they can afford to be arrogant. What a pity...

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Cute spot, beautiful view up top, and was pretty full on the bottom. Fried croquettes were AMAZING, and the mustard sauce hit the spot

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Original place, not too expensive. Don't forget your belongings there though, only half of it will still be there when you come back to grab it, even though you had confirmation everything was there on the phone before.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Cozy place and very good Bier. Not too expensive, the place is just perfect. Good for tourists, great music and and people! Recommended

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very lovely spot, great beer, limited but tasty menu, friendly staff. Perfect for a sunny afternoon!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: There in September.  Snacks were fine, service not so much. Had to ask 3 servers and wait over 30 minutes for my appetizer to arrive

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great view of the canal on a good day. Friendly staff. Slightly overpriced drink but bar snacks are reasonably priced to counter it.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Typical cafe in Amsterdam. Very Dutch. Had a sign above the bar congratulating two girls (regulars presumably) for having the best breasts this month. Interesting.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: One of the oldest bars in Amsterdam I highly recommend anybody and everybody have visit and grab a pint!! Love Cafe de Sluyswacht!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Went in planning to have a drink and some food, but we had no luck getting served. I ordered drinks at the bar and grabbed a table upstairs. The bartender said he would bring them up, but after waiting 10 minutes, I went downstairs to check on things. Our bartender was nowhere to be found, so we left...

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: The location is great.  You can sit outside and view all of the boats passing by in the canal while you enjoy some good brews.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Uniquely Amsterdam! The most crooked bar around with a romantic, cozy interior, good modest priced drinks. Great spot

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: It's a simple bar - but location (and, well, the place itself) is amazing (beer and snacks are good too though).

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: So the translation from Dutch "cafe de Sluyswacht" to English is also "cafe de Sluyswacht"?! Wow I'm so pleased that you have published your name twice! No, I don't think you've got any quality

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Peculiar cafe, from an old Amsterdam building, with more than 300 years. Good drinks available and great location

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: A nice place for celebrations/parties. Upper floor is spacious for 30-40 people. Good service.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Great atmosphere in the old building,  nice views, good food and great beer üç∫. Service was also very good!

Name: Sluyswacht

Dutch bar, interesting layout, laid back feeling.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Very special bar, housed almost in the canal. Be very careful, your beer can drop out of the glass without noticing!

Name: Sluyswacht

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Thanks for not taking care of the noise screaming drunk people make on your  premises, forcing the entire neighbourhood to live with absurd levels of noise pollution, even way past midnight. We have send another complaint to the local council.

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: The two ( male) servers working today handled a huge crowd with ease. Great experience and the food was great too!

Name: Sluyswacht
Review Text: Meh. It's nice from the outside but the inside isn't up to much. Take a look at the facia and then head to one of the far superior brown bar interiors.
